prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Will Stefan contact me within the next 4 days? If so, what will be the nature and content of his communication?

Please note that this reading requires 100% accuracy and honesty in interpretation, regardless of whether the aspects reveal positive or negative energies. The chart must be read exactly as it presents itself, without bias in either direction. If the aspects show negativity, that negativity will be revealed fully. If the aspects show positivity, that positivity will be revealed fully. There shall be no softening of negative aspects, nor any dampening of positive ones. The only acceptable outcome is to interpret precisely what the chart demonstrates through its aspects, houses, and planetary positions - be that wonderful, terrible, or anywhere in between. Complete accuracy to the chart's true message is the sole priority.

Also, please do not immediately assume that I'm looking for romantic inclinations. I am not certain what, if any, feelings exist, and what those feelings are deemed to be. That is the reason I have drawn up the chart, is to get a true determination. So, any biasing towards romantic inclination or otherwise should be removed, and ensure that this chart is interpreted fully and objectively to discern the true nature of Stefan's feelings, thoughts, and intentions.

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

Since Mars resides in the Ascendant's 9th house, then Mars will represent Stefan along with Mercury (lord of the 9th) as supporting representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda Blackwood begins by cataloging the factual elements of the horary chart as drawn by Melissa Gale for the query “Will Stefan contact me within the next four days? If so, what will be the nature and content of his communication?” The following data points are recorded strictly as they appear, using classical horary principles:

• Planetary Positions and Key Degrees
 – Sun at 5°44′ Pisces
 – Moon at 14°53′ Capricorn
 – Mercury at 17°45′ Pisces
 – Venus at 10°09′ Aries
 – Mars at 17°00′ (noted in Cancer by planet listing; however, the house layout places Mars in the 9th House, which represents Stefan as per the query’s designation)
 – Jupiter at 11°55′ Gemini
 – Saturn at 20°05′ Pisces
 – Uranus at 23°31′ Taurus
 – Neptune at 28°42′ Pisces
 – Pluto at 2°45′ Aquarius
 – North Node at 28°37′ Pisces (retrograde)
 – Chiron at 20°22′ Aries
 – Ascendant at 16°37′ Libra
 – MC (Medium Coeli) at 19°42′ Cancer
 – IC (Imum Coeli) at 19°42′ Capricorn

• House Configuration Relevant to the Query
 – The Ascendant (16° Libra) represents Melissa Gale.
 – The 9th House (starting at 12° Gemini) is designated for the foreign/expansive connection; within this framework, Mars is interpretted to function as Stefan’s representative, with Mercury (lord of the 9th) acting in supportive capacity.
 – Additional house placements of note include the 10th House (starts at 19° Cancer) and the 7th House (starts at 16° Aries, with Chiron present) which may also contribute to the overall relational dynamic.

• Major Aspects (Listed with Orbs)
 – MC Opposite IC: orb 0°
 – Neptune Conjunction North Node: orb 0°
 – Mercury Trine Mars: orb 0°
 – Saturn Sextile IC: orb 1°
 – Venus Sextile Jupiter: orb 1°
 – Chiron Square IC: orb 1°
 – Chiron Square MC: orb 1°
 – Mars Square Ascendant: orb 1°
 – Saturn Trine MC: orb 1°
 – Mercury Sextile IC: orb 2°
 – Moon Square Ascendant: orb 2°
 – Mars Opposition IC: orb 2°
 – Mars Conjunction MC: orb 2°
 – Mercury Trine MC: orb 2°
 – Saturn Sextile Uranus: orb 3°
 – Moon Sextile Mercury: orb 3°
 – Ascendant Square IC: orb 3°
 – Ascendant Square MC: orb 3°
 – Mars Square Chiron: orb 3°
 – Moon Opposition Mars: orb 3°
 – Mercury Conjunction Saturn: orb 3°
 – Mars Trine Saturn: orb 3°
 – Pluto Sextile North Node: orb 4°
 – Uranus Sextile MC: orb 4°
 – Moon Square Venus: orb 4°
 – Chiron Opposition Ascendant: orb 4°
 – Uranus Trine IC: orb 4°
 – Uranus Sextile Neptune: orb 5°
 – Moon Opposition MC: orb 5°
 – Moon Conjunction IC: orb 5°
 – Jupiter Trine Ascendant: orb 5°
 – Mars Sextile Uranus: orb 6°
 – Mercury Sextile Uranus: orb 6°
 – Moon Sextile Saturn: orb 6°
 – Mercury Square Jupiter: orb 6°
 – Moon Square Chiron: orb 6°
 – Sun Square Jupiter: orb 6°
 – Venus Opposition Ascendant: orb 6°
 – Venus Square Mars: orb 7°

• Notable Patterns Present
 – Grand Cross Pattern A: Involving MC (19° Cancer), Ascendant (16° Libra), IC (19° Capricorn), Chiron (20° Aries), Moon (14° Capricorn), and Mars (17° Cancer).
 – Grand Cross Pattern B: Involving Mars (17° Cancer), Ascendant (16° Libra), Moon (14° Capricorn), and Venus (10° Aries).
 – Cradle Pattern: Comprising Moon (14° Capricorn), MC (19° Cancer), Uranus (23°31′ Taurus), Saturn (20°05′ Pisces), Mercury (17°45′ Pisces), Mars (17° Cancer), and IC (19° Capricorn).

• Additional Special Features
 – The chart is set under a waning crescent Moon phase.
 – There is a dominant Water element among the inner planets and a prevailing Cardinal mode.
 – A concentration of planetary placements exists in the bottom right quadrant.
 – Chiron is in descent, and while the textual description notes Mars as “on the Midheaven” with Moon and IC on the Nadir, the recorded positions and house cusps warrant careful consideration to these points in the methodical reading.
 – The Square aspect recurs frequently (twelve instances noted), with the Moon engaging in twelve aspectual connections, and Neptune in Pisces serves as the sole dispositor for the cluster of related planetary energies.

• Key Data for Query Focus
 – Stefan is represented by the 9th House (notably containing Mars) and by extension, Mercury (as the 9th House’s lord), whose supportive aspect (Mercury trine Mars, orb 0°) is significant for communication matters.
 – Tension markers relevant to the query include:
  • Mars Square Ascendant (orb 1°) — suggesting potential friction as Stefan’s energy interacts with Melissa’s personal identity.
  • Mars Opposition IC (orb 2°) — indicating possible challenges related to personal or foundational issues in the anticipated communication.
  • Moon aspects (such as Moon Opposition Mars, orb 3°; Moon Square Ascendant, orb 2°) — pointing to an emotional undercurrent in the situation.
  • Supporting aspects (Mercury Trine Mars, orb 0°; Mercury Trine MC, orb 2°; Mercury Sextile IC, orb 2°) — which may favor clear, though complex, messaging.

This constitutes the complete compilation of the direct and relevant astrological data as it stands in the horary chart provided for the query. Further interpretation will proceed from these established data points, assessing the precise indicators of communication and the dynamic interplay between Stefan’s and Melissa’s representations.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda Blackwood now proceeds with the methodological interpretation of the chart details, answering the query: “Will Stefan contact me within the next four days, and if so, what will be the nature and content of his communication?” The analysis is drawn from the compiled horary data using classical horary and astrological principles.

STEP 1. IDENTIFYING THE REPRESENTATIVES
• Melissa Gale is represented by the Ascendant at 16° Libra.
• Stefan is designated by the Ascendant’s 9th House. In this chart, by the query’s instruction, Mars (supported by Mercury, lord of the 9th) stands in as his representative.

STEP 2. EVALUATING COMMUNICATION INDICATORS
• Mercury is at 17°45′ Pisces and forms a tight trine with Mars (orb 0°); this aspect strongly favors prompt and clear communication.
• Mercury also forms a trine with the MC (orb 2°), suggesting that any message from Stefan will have a notable outward (public or assertive) quality.
• The conjunction of Mercury with Saturn (orb 3°) adds caution or formality, tempering the impulsiveness of Mars with a sense of measured responsibility.

STEP 3. ASSESSING THE EMOTIONAL AND CONFLICTIVE ENERGIES
• Mars shows square aspects with the Ascendant (orb 1°) and with Chiron (orb 3°). These indicate that there may be personal friction or a painful edge to Stefan’s approach.
• The Moon forms an opposition with Mars (orb 3°) and a square with the Ascendant (orb 2°); emotionally, this points to an undercurrent of tension and potentially volatile feelings.
• A Grand Cross configuration that involves Mars, the Ascendant, and other key points confirms that while communication is likely, the mode will be charged with conflict or unresolved issues.

STEP 4. SYNTHESIZING THE PATTERN IN THE CONTEXT OF THE QUESTION
• The very close Mercury–Mars trine offers a clear sign that contact will occur within the next four days.
• The combination of dynamic yet tense aspects (Mars square Ascendant/Chiron and Moon opposition Mars) suggests that Stefan’s message will be direct and unfiltered, possibly addressing long-standing matters with an assertive (even aggressive) tone.
• The supportive influence of Mercury (further indicated by Mercury sextile IC at orb 2°) implies that while the content is frank and potentially abrasive, there is also an element of clarity and purpose behind his words.
• The presence of Saturn’s cautious influence (Mercury conjunct Saturn; Saturn sextile IC) hints that the communication might also contain practical details or a call for responsibility, even if delivered in a manner that could be perceived as harsh or critical.

STEP 5. FINAL DATA SUMMARY
• Representatives:
 – Melissa Gale: Ascendant (16° Libra)
 – Stefan: Represented by Mars (in the designated 9th House per instruction) plus supportive Mercury.
• Key aspects affecting communication:
 – Mercury trine Mars (orb 0°): Favors prompt and direct communication.
 – Mars square Ascendant (orb 1°): Indicates friction impacting how the message is received.
 – Moon opposition Mars (orb 3°) and Moon square Ascendant (orb 2°): Signify emotional volatility in the interaction.
 – Mercury conjunct Saturn (orb 3°) and Saturn’s supportive aspects: Impart a measured, though cautious, quality to the message.
• Overall Patterns:
 – Grand Cross configurations and the Cradle pattern reinforce that the energy is highly charged, with simultaneous support for immediate contact and for underlying tension.

FOUND INTERPRETATION:
• It is indicated with high confidence that Stefan will indeed make contact within the next four days.
• The nature of his communication is expected to be direct and unvarnished; he will likely raise issues that have been a source of tension or past hurt.
• The message will carry both assertive energy (Mars) and a communicative clarity (Mercury), suggesting that while the content aims to address specific matters, it may come off as abrupt and confrontational.
• The interplay of supportive and challenging aspects suggests that the contact is oriented to resolving or airing grievances rather than engaging in gentle rapport, even if the message might also include practical or corrective proposals.

This analysis adheres precisely to the data provided without bias. Further specifics regarding the content may be refined upon additional evidence, but the current reading reflects the chart’s true messaging as per the established horary principles.
